ai_summary: Reconnaissance completed for example.com. Discovered 10 subdomains, expanding the attack surface. Identified 15 open ports, indicating active services. Critical services detected on ports: 21, 22, 80, 443, 3306, 3389, 5432. Found 10 potential vulnerabilities requiring investigation. Web server vulnerabilities detected - immediate attention required. Database vulnerabilities identified - review access controls. Recommend conducting detailed vulnerability assessment and penetration testing.
